name: ladbu/laravel-ladwire-module
description: A modular Laravel package that adds Ladwire components to fresh Laravel projects

suggest.ladbu/laravel-ladwire-dashboard: Install dashboard module for statistics and overview
suggest.ladbu/laravel-ladwire-user-management: Install user management module for CRUD operations
suggest.ladbu/laravel-ladwire-settings: Install settings module for configuration management

post-install-cmd: @php -r "if (file_exists('vendor/autoload.php')) { echo '✅ Dependencies installed successfully!'; } else { echo '❌ Dependency installation failed!'; exit 1; }"
